channel.title: Counter strike source
channel.description:
Hello,
so i cant get a credit card >13 years old< and my mom wont let me use hers is this any way i can get counter strike VIA torrent Also i dont trust google or youtube for obvious reasons no flaming please and thanks.

item.title: Counter strike source
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:13, topic:292069”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=385906.msg2895031#msg2895031 date=1249158696]

protip: If you play non-steam servers, use hax. You don’t get a steam ban then.

What the fuck?

What is the point in playing Counter Strike if your gonna cheat? Takes the whole gameplay/fun out of it.

Retard…
[/quote]
Non-steam I said, because the Non-steam servers are shit.[/quote]
Sorry about that, I was a bit cranky yesterday.

Read full topic

item.title: Counter strike source
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:15, topic:292069”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=385906.msg2894919#msg2894919 date=1249152391]
protip: If you play non-steam servers, use hax. You don’t get a steam ban then.
[/quote]
Aren’t all servers for cs:s steam servers?
I think you mean Non Vac Secured servers. You won’t get a vac ban then.[/quote]
There are servers that you can play on without having a steam version of the game/steam account, I think that is what he meant.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

mr arrows95:

i dont feel liek getting into debt >.<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2009, 06:14:23 am[/size][hr]How do i memory patch steam?

you cant go into debt with a debit card j00 homo

item.title: Counter strike source
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

mr arrows95:

i dont feel liek getting into debt >.<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2009, 06:14:23 am[/size][hr]How do i memory patch steam?

Debit card stops you from going into debt. A Debit card only allows you to spend what you have, if there is nothing in your account you cannot spend anything because you lack the funds to do so.

Read full topic
